verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> the right <S%H6664><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, attend <S%H7181><s%> unto my cry <S%H7440><s%>, give ear <S%H238><s%> unto my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, that goes not <S%H3808><s%> out of feigned <S%H4820><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>.
Let my sentence <S%H4941><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> from your presence <S%H6440><s%>; let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> behold <S%H2372><s%> the things that are equal <S%H4339><s%>.

You have proved <S%H974><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%>; you have visited <S%H6485><s%> me in the night <S%H3915><s%>; you have tried <S%H6884><s%> me <S%H4672><s%>, and shall find nothing <S%H2161><s%>; I am purposed that my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall not transgress <S%H5674><s%>.
Concerning the works <S%H6468><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, by the word <S%H1697><s%> of your lips <S%H8193><s%> I have kept <S%H8104><s%> me from the paths <S%H734><s%> of the destroyer <S%H6530><s%>.
Hold up <S%H8551><s%> my goings <S%H838><s%> in your paths <S%H4570><s%>, that my footsteps <S%H6471><s%> slip not <S%H4131><s%>.
I have called <S%H7121><s%> upon you <S%H6030><s%>, for you will hear me <S%H410><s%>, O God: incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H8085><s%>, and hear my speech <S%H565><s%>.

Show your marvelous <S%H6395><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, O you that save <S%H3467><s%> by your right hand <S%H3225><s%> them which put their trust <S%H2620><s%> in you from those that rise up against them <S%H6965><s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> me as the apple <S%H380><s%> of the eye <S%H1323><s%>, hide <S%H5641><s%> me under the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of your wings <S%H3671><s%>,
From <S%H6440><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> that <S%H2098><s%> oppress <S%H7703><s%> me <S%H5315><s%>, from my deadly enemies <S%H341><s%>, who compass me about <S%H5362><s%>.
They are enclosed <S%H5462><s%> in their own fat <S%H2459><s%>: with their mouth <S%H6310><s%> they speak <S%H1696><s%> proudly <S%H1348><s%>.
They have now surrounded <S%H5437><s%> us in our steps <S%H838><s%>: they have set <S%H7896><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> to throw us down <S%H5186><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>;
Like <S%H1825><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> that is greedy <S%H3700><s%> of his prey <S%H2963><s%>, and as it were a young lion <S%H3715><s%> lurking <S%H3427><s%> in secret places <S%H4565><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, disappoint <S%H6923><s%> him <S%H6440><s%>, cast him down <S%H3766><s%>: deliver <S%H6403><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, which is your sword <S%H2719><s%>:

From men <S%H4962><s%> which are your hand <S%H3027><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, from men <S%H4962><s%> of the world <S%H2465><s%>, which have their portion <S%H2506><s%> in this life <S%H2416><s%>, and whose belly <S%H990><s%> you fill <S%H4390><s%> with your hid <S%H6840><s%> treasure <S%H7646><s%>: they are full of sons <S%H1121><s%>, and leave <S%H3240><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of their substance to their babes <S%H5768><s%>.
As for me <S%H2372><s%>, I will behold your face <S%H6440><s%> in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: I shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%>, when I awake <S%H6974><s%>, with your likeness <S%H8544><s%>.
